summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing alerts related to compliance issues for NES, LLC, which is associated with Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates that the alerts were cleared as false positives, and it provides details about the nature of the alerts concerning other entities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the ultimate beneficial owner (UBO) of NES, LLC, which is formed to manage expenses related to one of his homes.

persons.name: Alyssa Taliaferro
persons.context: Alyssa Taliaferro is the sender of the email, providing information about the compliance alerts and their clearance.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the ultimate beneficial owner of NES, LLC, which is formed to manage expenses related to his properties.

keyFacts: NES, LLC was formed to manage expenses associated with one of Jeffrey Epstein's homes.
The email discusses compliance alerts generated for NES, LLC.
Two alerts were mentioned: one regarding Nasdaq Execution Services, LLC, and another about National Enterprise Systems, Inc.
The alerts were cleared as false positives by BLAFC-WM.
